page.title: 03PRIMARY SCHOOLS
page.content: At Kislingbury Primary School there are {eighty four pupils,}twenty of which are split up into four different classes. Seven people are employed,four are teachers and three are cooking staff.Pupils do not have to wear school uniform,this is quite popular in village schools.The chidren attend swimming lessons weekly. Harpole Primary has {120 pupils} attending.They have four classes roughly {30 pupils}in each class.Six teachers,two dinner staff,one caretaker and one nursery teacher are employed at this school.The school has their own swimming pool. They take the pupils on school trips.The school was first built in{ 1837,}made from two cottages with one person in charge of the whole lot.Then they rebuilt it in {1972.}
